#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define ll unsigned long long
#define pr  100003
#include<vector>
ll n,k;

ll pow(ll a, ll b, ll MOD)
{
    long long x=1,y=a;
    while(b > 0)
    {
        if(b%2 == 1)
        {
            x=(x*y);
            if(x>MOD) x%=MOD;
        }
        y = (y*y);
        if(y>MOD) y%=MOD;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}
long long SmallC(ll n, ll r, ll MOD)
{
    if(n<r)return 0;
    if(r==n)return 1;
    long long i,res=1,inv=1;
    for(i=1;i<=r;i++)
    {
        res = (res*(n-r+i))%MOD;
        inv = (inv*i)%MOD;
    }
    inv = pow(inv,MOD-2,MOD);
    res =  (res*inv)%MOD;
    return res;
}

ll Lucas(ll n, ll m, ll p)
{
    if (n==0 && m==0) return 1;
    ll ni = n % p;
    ll mi = m % p;
    if (mi>ni) return 0;
    return ((Lucas(n/p, m/p, p)%p * SmallC(ni, mi, p)%p))%p;
}

ll C(ll n, ll r, ll MOD)
{
    return ((Lucas(n, r, MOD)))%MOD;
}



int main()
{

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
     cin>>n>>k;
     cout<<(Lucas(n-k+1,k,pr))%pr<<endl;;
    }
}
